CheckTitle: Check if S3 buckets have encryption (SSE) enabled.
Description: If Security groups are not properly configured the attack surface is increased.
Risk: Amazon S3 default encryption provides a way to set the default encryption behavior for an S3 bucket. This will ensure data-at-rest is encrypted.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that S3 buckets has encryption at rest enabled.
